name: ColorSpasm Desktop
description:
ColorSpasm is a game of concentration. Each round begins with a single color, you will have three seconds to memorize it. That's the Color in ColorSpasm. Next is the spasm, a barrage of colors will appear on screen, on the final change one of the squares will be the original color. If correct the next round begins, if wrong you lose the game. As the rounds progress the spasm gets longer and the round gets more difficult. 

ColorSpasm now has a colorblind mode! A symbol will appear over the squares but the game plays the same, find the original square. 

ColorSpasm Desktop is Open Source! Find out how it was made and how to download the source here -> https://www.youtube.com/TezFraser
